name: Google Home
description: Let's Gladys talk using your Google Home and alerts your in case of notification
instructionsHTML:
Installation

Add a new Gladys parameter GOOGLE_HOME_IP with your Google Home IP (example: 192.168.1.25).

Install the module, restart Gladys, and that's it.

The Gladys notification system can also be used, only a user is present in the machine house.

Information

It also can read Gladys notification with your Google Home, according to configure Gladys notification in parameters menu.

Script

Add a new script, and let's talk :

gladys.modules['google-home'].say({
  text: "Nice to see you at home",
  language: "en"
});
instructionsMarkDown:
## Installation

Add a new Gladys parameter **GOOGLE_HOME_IP** with your Google Home IP (example: 192.168.1.25).

Install the module, restart Gladys, and that's it.

The Gladys notification system can also be used, only a user is present in the machine house.

## Information

It also can read Gladys notification with your Google Home, according to configure Gladys notification in parameters menu.

## Script

Add a new script, and let's talk :
```
gladys.modules['google-home'].say({
  text: "Nice to see you at home",
  language: "en"
});
```
